title: EmEmO theliyaka
sahitya:
EmEmO teliyaka balikedaru celulAra nAm da daya lEka



caraNam 1



munu mandaragiri munuga kUrmamai vIlpuna dAlcaga lEdA



caraNam 2



kari rAja makaricE gAsi cendaga nEnu karuNa jUDa lEdA



caraNam 3



veravaka nIru joccina sOmakuni goTTi vEdamu tElAdA



caraNam 4



kALindilOni kAliyuni madambunu kAla nanacha lEdA



caraNam 5



makaramu gompOyina guru putruNi mari decci osaga lEdA



caraNam 6



tyAgarAjunaku sakhuDaina nAdu pratApamu vina lEdA
